description: Euclid-Mullin sequence (A000945) with initial value a(1)=65537 instead of a(1)=2.
mathematica: a[1]=65537; a[n_] := First[ Flatten[ FactorInteger[ 1+Product[ a[ j ], {j, 1, n-1} ] ] ] ]; Array[a, 10]
prog: (PARI) spf(n)=my(f=factor(n)[1, 1]); ffirst(m)=my(v=vector(m)); v[1]=65537; for(i=2, m, v[i]=spf(1+prod(j=1, i-1, v[j]))); v \\ _Anders Hellstr√∂m_, Dec 07 2015
author: _Labos Elemer_
